name: Mind the gap (Bob Morate)
description:
A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 31 entirely on my own under the theme "Entire game in one screen".

Help the little guys to cross to the other side of the bridge and keep their balance! They have no name, so if you want to help me out decide one for them, feel free to tweet me @bobmorate!

You will lose balance for every step or jump you take on the board (not on the platforms) and when you're hit by an enemy while not standing on the initial platform. Regain balance by standing still anywhere!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys left and right to move.

Arrow key up to jump.

Changelog (0.12)

Made very minor changes to adapt for the HTML5 version. None of these changes will appear on the executable version:

  • Removed the "Exit game" button from the main menu.
  • Removed the tutorial text on lv 6, instructing you that you can quit the game by pressing the Q key.
